definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: Time of detection greatly effects melanoma's cure rate.
sentences.chinese: 黑素瘤確診的時間早晚極大地影響着治癒的概率。

sentences.english: Melatonin is an important hormone synthesized and secreted by the pineal gland.
sentences.chinese: 褪黑素是人體腦內松果腺合成與分泌的一種重要激素。

sentences.english: Keeping the lights on through the night also reduced the amount of melatonin produced.
sentences.chinese: 整夜保持開燈也會降低褪黑素產生的量。

sentences.english: When there's a lack of light, serotonin converts into melatonin, which controls our sleep.
sentences.chinese: 光線不足時，血清素就會轉化爲控制睡眠的褪黑素。

sentences.english: Freckles are small bunches of melanin that are visible on individuals with fair skin.
sentences.chinese: 雀斑是在人白皙的皮膚上可以看見的小點黑素。

sentences.english: About 68, 000 cases of melanoma will be diagnosed in Americans this year alone.
sentences.chinese: 單單在今年，美國就有68000例黑素瘤被確診。

sentences.english: Worldwide, the incidence of melanoma varies more than 150-fold.
sentences.chinese: 全世界黑素瘤發病率的差異超過150倍。

sentences.english: Only the dominant version of the color gene results in eumelanin production;
sentences.chinese: 影響真黑素產生的只能是色彩基因的控制。

sentences.english: They wondered if melatonin played a role in learning and memory.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員懷疑褪黑素影響學習和記憶。

sentences.english: This article reviews the latest development of MLT applied in ophthalmology.
sentences.chinese: 本文對近年來褪黑素在眼科應用的最新進展進行綜述。

sentences.english: The single or compound melanosomes were found in those cells by ultra-structural observation.
sentences.chinese: 超微結構觀察痣細胞內存在單個或複合黑素小體。

sentences.english: Most of the risk factors for melanoma are unavoidable.
sentences.chinese: 導致黑素瘤的危險因素中大部分都是難以避免的。

sentences.english: Another type of cell is the melanocyte.
sentences.chinese: 另一種類型的細胞是黑素細胞。

sentences.english: Vitiligo is associated with the function loss of epidermal melanocytes.
sentences.chinese: 白癜風由於表皮黑素細胞的功能喪失而引起。

sentences.english: Objective To recognize furthermore the acral lentiginous melanoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的進一步認識肢端雀斑樣痣性黑素瘤。

sentences.english: It is secreted by the brain cells in honeybees.
sentences.chinese: 在蜜蜂中褪黑素由其腦細胞進行分泌。

definition: anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)/assimilation
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
